DOC.brief_summary: Patients randomize two group ( 1/1 ) one year : - 40 mg adalimumab subcutaneously ( sc ) every week - placebo The effect x-rays clinical parameter evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Efficacy Adalimumab Patients With Erosive Osteoarthritis Interphalangeal Finger Joints
DOC.criteria: Clear erosive image xray least one interphalangeal finger joint
